description.value:
The plans you make include your allies as well as yourself. When you hit a creature with an attack on which you substituted your attack roll due to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Devise a Stratagem]{Devise a Strategem}, designate one ally.

The creature you hit is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Flat-Footed] to that ally on the next attack the designated ally makes against that creature before the start of your next turn.

rules.text: The creature you hit is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Flat-Footed] to a designated ally on the next attack the ally makes against the creature before the start of your next turn.
